alert.note: Alert for Forest; Langlade; Lincoln; Marathon; Oneida (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 9:53PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lincoln, southwestern Forest, northeastern Marathon, southern Oneida and western Langlade Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 952 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Headwaters Wilderness to 8 miles east of Rhinelander to near Woodboro to 6 miles south of Merrill. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Headwaters Wilderness around 955 PM CDT. Parrish around 1010 PM CDT. Crandon around 1040 PM CDT. Antigo around 1045 PM CDT. Pearson around 1050 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Gagen, Ackley Wildlife Area, Bradley, Dudley, Kelly Lynn Bog Natural Area, Post Lake, Kempster, Lower Tomahawk River Natural Area, Harshaw and Otter Springs Recreation Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
